channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18507] AccumuloIndexedOutputFormat.AccumuloRecordWriter.close() - typo in the condition
item.description:
This condition always true:

if(var7.getAuthorizationFailuresMap().size() >= 0) {

Obviously, size() always >= 0 , so should > instead of.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
